review: I love the Amazon Fire stick. I use it every day and it has been the best thing for any TV. It has many all the apps you need. The remote is very nice and allows easy access to all the apps. Using it with your phone is useful too. There is no competition to the Fire Stick. Dont even think about getting Chromecast, it doesn't even compare to the Fire Stick.Now that I have said all the things I about the Fire Stick, I will rant on something that bugs me about it.Wireless connectivity must be fixed.I hate when my fire stick wont connect to the internet. It connects to my home router, but sometimes it just wont fully connect.I get the error "Connected with Problems"I dont think it is difficult to fix this error as must devices are connected to WIFI now and the bugs from early development have been fix and usually when there is a connectivity issue, it is fixed by an update very quickly. This product has been out for months and it still has this issue.Its not that big of a deal to re enter your password or reset the stick, but it is an inconvenience and a waste of time.I wish I could rate it lower, but I do love it enough to give it Four Stars.Please fix the connectivity issue.This is the best thing since sliced bread
